meanings.definition: A small, decorative item or ornament placed on a post or pole.
meanings.sent1: The postique on the fence added a touch of color to the garden.
meanings.sent2: She bought a beautiful postique to decorate her porch.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mistook the postique for a nut and tried to bury it.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of postiques turned the dull posts into a vibrant display.
meanings.sent5: The postique glinted in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: To attach or affix something to a post or pole.
meanings.sent1: He carefully postiqued the sign to the wooden post.
meanings.sent2: She postiqued the birdhouse securely to the pole in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully postiqued their drawings all over the fence.
meanings.sent4: She postiqued her memories to the tree of life, never to forget.
meanings.sent5: The artist postiqued her dreams to the highest peak, reaching for the stars.

meanings.definition: A message or piece of content shared on a social media platform.
meanings.sent1: Her postique on the platform received many likes and comments.
meanings.sent2: He shared an inspiring postique about kindness on social media.
meanings.sent3: The funny postique she posted made everyone laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: His postique on the internet sparked a lively discussion among users.
meanings.sent5: The viral postique spread like wildfire across the online community.
